name: Education Funding
title: Sen. Baldwin Concerned Trump Admin. Will "Illegally" Impound Education Funds
description:
Sen. Tammy Baldwin (D-WI) said Tuesday she was "deeply concerned" the Trump administration was planning to "illegally" impound federally appropriated funding as it seeks to dismantle the Education Department.

"While this administration clearly wants to eliminate the Department of Education, Congress has not passed any law to do so. Quite the opposite, in fact," she said, mentioning the funding approved earlier this year on a bipartisan basis.
